sidebar_label: "Get business identifications"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true

sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"

custom_edit_url: null
proxy: https://proxy.writechoice.io/
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get business identifications"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/receiver/data/v2/customer/business/identifications/{consentPactualId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Endpoint that our client must call to get the information from Open Finance:
    
* Open Finance endpoint that will be requested: ```(GET /business/identifications)```
    
* FamilyType: ```Dados Cadastrais``` 
    
The response content provided by this endpoint uses the same entity as the provided on the [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/602669235/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+DC+Dados+Cadastrais+-+v2.2.0).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"page","description":"Número da página que está sendo requisitada (o valor da primeira página é 1).","schema":{"format":"int32","default":1,"maximum":2147483647,"minimum":1,"type":"integer"},"in":"query"},{"name":"page-size","description":"Quantidade total de registros por páginas.","schema":{"format":"int32","default":25,"maximum":1000,"minimum":1,"type":"integer"},"in":"query"},{"name":"pagination-key","description":"Identificador de rechamada, utilizado para evitar a contagem de chamadas ao endpoint durante a paginação.","schema":{"maxLength":2048,"pattern":"[\\w\\W\\s]*","type":"string"},"in":"query"},{"name":"consentPactualId","description":"The Consent PactualId","schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
